${modID}:PowerID.NAME: Ultimate Power
DESCRIPTIONS: You are Very Cool and Strong.

${modID}:RondelmancyPower.NAME: Rondelmancy
DESCRIPTIONS: When you gain #yShivs, gain #b%d more #yShiv%s. If your hand is full, play them instead.

${modID}:UpdateJammerPower.NAME: Update Jammer
DESCRIPTIONS: Orbs continue their passive effects after being #yEvoked.

${modID}:OrbShockPower.NAME: Jammed Lightning
DESCRIPTIONS: Activate #b%d passive #yLightning%s at the end of your turns.

${modID}:OrbFrostPower.NAME: Jammed Frost
DESCRIPTIONS: Activate #b%d passive #yFrost%s at the end of your turns.

${modID}:OrbDarkPower.NAME: Jammed Darkness
DESCRIPTIONS: Activate #b%d passive #yDark%s at the end of your turns.

${modID}:OrbPlasmaPower.NAME: Jammed Plasma
DESCRIPTIONS: Activate #b%d passive #yPlasma%s at the start of your turns.

${modID}:DoubleAttacksPower.NAME: Double Attacks
DESCRIPTIONS: All your #yAttacks are played twice for the next #b%d turn%s.

${modID}:FracturePower.NAME: Fracture
DESCRIPTIONS: Receive #b%d additional damage from #yAttacks. Reduce #yFracture by #b1 each turn.

${modID}:LoseFocusPower.NAME: Focus Down
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, lose #b%d #yFocus.

${modID}:MordhauPower.NAME: Mordhau
DESCRIPTIONS: Your #yAttacks apply #yFracture for the next #b%d turn%s.
